Set to 'No' leaves the customer uninformed on the payment obligations.

The payment method show only for orders with an order amount smaller then the maximum amount.

Merchant is protected by PayPals Seller Protection Policy for both Unauthorized Payment and Item Not Received

You have enabled PayPal Seller Protection. This feature requires Region with regard to the shipping address of the customer. Please select the specific countries to which PayPal is applicable for, and make the Regions required accordingly.
PayPal vereist om geinformeerd te worden over de provincie waar de klant woonachtig is. U dient hierbij het provincie-veld voor de klant te verplichten. Selecteer hiervoor de specifieke landen waar PayPal van toe passing is, en maak de provincie-velden voor die landen verplicht.

You have enabled PayPal Seller Protection. This feature requires Region with regard to the shipping address of the customer. Please select the specific countries to which PayPal is applicable for, and make the Regions required accordingly.
